pages.text: Jiaruo wo lianmin tamen, erqie jiechu tamen suo zao de kunan, tamen bi guzhi hengman, er paihuai yu qitu zhi zhong.
Wo que yi yong xingfa chengzhi tamen, dan tamen bu shuncong tamen de zhu, tamen ye budui ta biaoshi qianxun.
Zhidao wo dui tamen kaipi yanxing zhi men de shihou, tamen wei ta er huran biancheng shiwang zhe.
Zhu ceng wei nimen chuangzao ermu he xin, nimen de ganxie shi hen shao de.
Ta ceng shi nimen zai dadishang fanzhi, nimen yao bei jihe zai ta nali,
ta shi si wu sheng, shi shengwu si, zhouye de gengdie you ta zhuchi. Nandao nimen bu liaojie ma?
Buran, tamen shuo liao ru guren suo shuo dehua,
tamen shuo:`Women sihou, yi biancheng chen'ai he xiu gu de shihou, nandao women hai biding yao fuhuo ma?
Women he women de zuxian, yiqian que yi shouguo zhe zhong jinggaole. Zhege zhishi guren de shenhua.'
Ni shuo:`Da di he qizhong de renwu, jiujing shi wei shui suoyou? Ruguo nimen zhidao.'
Tamen yao shuo:`Wei zhenzhu suoyou.'Ni shuo:`Nimen zen bu jide ne?'
Ni shuo:`Shui shi qitian de zhu he weida de baozuo de zhu ne?'
Tamen yao shuo:`Zhenzhu.'Ni shuo:`Na nimen zen bu jingwei ne?'
Ni shuo:`Wanwu de zhuquan, zai shui de zhangwo zhi zhong? Shui neng baohu zhongsheng, er ta ziji bu shou baohu ne? Ruguo nimen zhidao.'
Tamen yao shuo:`Shi zhenzhu.'Ni shuo:`Nimen zenme bei ren mihuo ne?'
